question_text: Which of the following threats are specifically mitigated by implementing PIN-protected printing or badging? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Unauthorized viewing of printed confidential data
Sensitive documents left unattended in trays
Untracked printing activity by guest users
correct_answer: Unauthorized viewing of printed confidential data
Sensitive documents left unattended in trays
Untracked printing activity by guest users
explanation: Secured printing methods like PINs and badges help protect printed output from unauthorized access and enforce traceable user activity. They do not directly prevent endpoint compromise or accidental page generation.
